thread.title: Win a state-of-the-art printer for your SME
thread.title_full: Win a state-of-the-art printer for your SME - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a state-of-the-art printer for your SME
text: Why waste your time being tied to your desk doing paperwork when you could spend that time more efficiently propelling your business forward ? Small business owners have proven, in recent surveys performed by Canon, that they feel restricted by the amount of admin they need to do in order to keep on top of their business. Yet working on admin all day leaves little time for carrying out profitable activities within your company. Canonâ€™s new range of clever MAXIFY printers helps SMEs handle the paperwork much more efficiently, revolutionising workdays with wi-fi features so that business owners can connect from afar using their PC, smartphone, tablet and cloud services. The MAXIFY MB5350, boasts All-in-One functions: scan, copy, print and fax all from one source. Alongside this, there is a Quick First Print feature, which prints your first document in seven seconds and productive paper handling, which means a larger sheet capacity saves time in reloading. Free yourself and propel your business forward with MAXIFY. To be in with a chance of winning one of four MAXIFY MB5350 printers simply complete the form below by midnight on Sunday 20 December, 2015. Online Form - Win a state-of-the-art printer for your SME
